title: Nora
body:
Nora: Yes, Detective?
[[I'd like to some questions|Nora.Questions]]

title: Nora.Greet.Avoiding
body:
Nora: Hello Detective.
Nora: I'm sorry, but I'm very busy right now. Can this wait?
[[This is urgent. It's about Jacob Wright|Nora.Greet.Jacob]]
[[I'm running out of patience. Open the door|Nora.Greet.Scared]]

title: Nora.Greet.Cautious
body:
...
Nora: Alright then, let me unlock the door.
<<FadeScreen NoraEventController>>

title: Nora.Greet.Jacob
body:
<<runAnimation AnimationObject angry Nora>>
Nora: I'll save you some time. He's a bastard, and we're not seeing each other anymore.
Nora: He can rot in hell for all I care.
[[Funny you should say that. I'm his death|Nora.Greet.Avoid2]]
[[I'd rather not have this conversation through a door|Nora.Greet.Willing]]

title: Nora.Greet.Willing
body:
Nora: Ugh. Fine. But make it quick.
<<FadeScreen NoraEventController>>

title: Nora.Greet.Avoid2
body:
<<runAnimation AnimationObject angry Nora>>
Nora: Listen, I've told you everything I know.
Nora: Just leave me alone.
[[I've had about enough of this. Open the door!|Nora.Greet.Scared]]

title: Nora.Questions
body:
[[What can you tell me about Jacob?|Nora.Question.Jacob]]
[[Where were you last night?|Nora.Question.LastNight]]
[[What do you do, exactly, Nora? |Nora.Question.Self]]

title: Nora.Question.Jacob
body:
<<runAnimation AnimationObject talking Nora>>
Nora: We were lovers for the last month.
Nora: I thought things were getting pretty serious, but clearly that wasn't the case.
Nora: Three days ago he told me we were finished. No warning, no explaination, he just decided we were done.
<<$noraIsSuspect = true>>
[[I'm sorry to hear that. I have more questions.|Nora.Questions]]
[[Sounds like motive to me!|Nora.Accuse]]
[[I'm sorry to hear that. I have no more questions|Nora.Exit]]

title: Nora.Question.LastNight
body:
<<runAnimation AnimationObject talking Nora>>
Nora: I was at home, finialising my leave.
[[Can anyone verify that?|Nora.Question.LastNight.Confirm]]
[[I think you're lying!|Nora.Accuse]]
[[Thanks, I have more questions|Nora.Questions]]
[[Thanks, no more questions for now|Nora.Exit]]

title: Nora.Accuse
body:
<<runAnimation AnimationObject angry Nora>>
Nora: Do you have any proof to back up that accusation?
Nora: I didn't think so. Get the hell out of my house!

title: Nora.Question.Self
body:
<<runAnimation AnimationObject happy Nora>>
Nora: I'm a nurse at the hospital downtown.
Nora: I started working there a year ago after I finished my degree.
[[Thanks. I have more questions.|Nora.Questions]]
[[Thanks. Nothing else for now.|Nora.Exit]]

title: Nora.Exit
body: Nora: Try not to make a mess.

title: Nora.Intro
body:
<<set $morgueCall to true>>
Nora: Hello? Who is it?
[[Detective Schmidt. I'd like to speak with you.|Nora.Greet.Avoiding]]
[[This is the police. Open up.|Nora.Greet.Cautious]]

title: Nora.Question.LastNight.Confirm
body:
<<runAnimation AnimationObject talking Nora>>
Plenty of people.
Call my work.
My colleagues can vouch for me.
